com.groupdocs.metadata.core

Class OpenTypeFont

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.groupdocs.metadata.core.MetadataPackage
      • com.groupdocs.metadata.core.CustomPackage
        • com.groupdocs.metadata.core.OpenTypeFont
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<MetadataProperty>

    public class OpenTypeFont
extends CustomPackage

    Represents a single font extracted from a file.

    Learn more

    • Working with OpenType fonts
